Introduction to Privacy Policy

Welcome to OfferNHire. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or engage with our job portal.

1. Information We Collect: We collect personal information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and resume details. We may also collect information about your usage of our website and services, including IP addresses and browsing behavior.

2. How We Use Your Information: We use the information we collect to provide, improve, and personalize our services. This includes facilitating job applications, communicating with you about job opportunities, and enhancing your overall experience on our platform.

3. Sharing Your Information: We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances:

  • Employers and Recruiters: We may share your information with employers and recruiters who are seeking candidates for job openings. This helps us match your profile with relevant job opportunities and facilitates the recruitment process.
  • Service Providers: We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or providing services to you. These service providers are obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed.
  • Advertising and Analytics Companies: We may work with advertising and analytics companies to enhance our marketing efforts and analyze user behavior on our website. These third parties may collect and use information about your interactions with our site to provide targeted advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our campaigns.
  • Legal and Compliance Requirements: We may also disclose your information if required to do so by law, or if we believe that such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights or the safety of others, or enforce our terms and conditions.

4. Security Measures: We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

5. Your Choices: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the instructions in those communications.

6. Changes to This Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the revised policy on our website

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at connect@offernhire.com

Cookies

OfferNHire uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding their usage.

What Are Cookies?

  • Session Cookies: Temporary cookies that expire once you close your browser.
  • Persistent Cookies: Cookies that remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them.

How We Use Cookies

  • Essential Cookies: Necessary for the operation of our website. They allow you to navigate and use our site features.
  • Performance Cookies: Collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are most popular.
  • Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and choices to enhance your experience on our site.
  • Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant ads to you and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

Third-Party Cookies

We may also use cookies from third-party services such as Google Analytics to understand website traffic and usage patterns. These third-party cookies are governed by the respective privacy policies of the third parties.

Managing Cookies

You have the option to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. However, this may prevent you from taking full advantage of our website.

Your Consent

By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this Cookies Policy. You can withdraw your consent at any time by changing your browser settings to decline cookies.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about our use of cookies, please contact us at connect@offernhire.com

Activity

Account Information: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and for all activities that occur under their account.

Accurate Information: Users must provide accurate and complete information when creating a profile, applying for jobs, or posting job listings.

Prohibited Activities: Users are prohibited from engaging in activities that:

  • Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
  • Involve the transmission of any unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, spam, or any other form of solicitation.
  • Contain viruses, Trojan horses, worms, or any other malicious software.
  • Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity.

Employer Responsibilities

Job Postings: Employers must ensure that all job postings are accurate and do not contain misleading information. Duplicate job postings are not allowed.

Candidate Data Usage: Employers may access, save, and download candidate data for recruitment purposes only. This data must not be shared with unauthorized third parties.

Compliance: Employers must comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using candidate data and must respect candidates' privacy and consent preferences.

Recruiter Responsibilities

Accurate Representation: Recruiters must accurately represent the positions they are recruiting for and must not post misleading or deceptive job advertisements.

Confidentiality: Recruiters must maintain the confidentiality of candidate information and use it solely for recruitment purposes. Unauthorized sharing of candidate data with third parties is strictly prohibited.

Ethical Practices: Recruiters must adhere to ethical recruitment practices, which include providing clear and truthful information about job opportunities and maintaining professional conduct throughout the recruitment process.

Candidate Interaction: Recruiters must treat all candidates with respect and professionalism, providing timely feedback and updates throughout the recruitment process.

Compliance: Recruiters must comply with all applicable laws and regulations related to employment and data protection, ensuring the fair and lawful handling of candidate information.

Content Standards

Appropriate Content: All content uploaded to CareerX24 must be appropriate and not contain offensive, discriminatory, or misleading language.

Intellectual Property: Users must not upload content that infringes on any intellectual property rights of others.

Monitoring and Enforcement: OfferNHire reserves the right to monitor and review all user activity and content. Any content or activity that violates these policies may be removed, and the responsible account may be suspended or terminated.

Reporting Violations

Users are encouraged to report any violations of this policy to OfferNHire's support team. All reports will be investigated promptly, and appropriate action will be taken.

Amendments

OfferNHire reserves the right to amend this policy at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes and are encouraged to review the policy regularly to stay informed.

This policy is designed to ensure a safe, respectful, and efficient environment for all users of the OfferNHire job portal. For more information or assistance, please contact our support team at connect@offernhire.com

OfferNHire is the heart of the job community, the ultimate resource to discover and connect with top talent and job opportunities worldwide. Built for people, powered by purpose
